}}

Constructs a new {{tt|stop_token}} object.

@1@ Constructs an empty {{tt|stop_token}} with no associated stop-state.
@2@ Copy constructor. Constructs a {{tt|stop_token}} whose associated stop-state is the same as that of {{c|other}}.
@3@ Move constructor. Constructs a {{tt|stop_token}} whose associated stop-state is the same as that of {{c|other}}; {{c|other}} is left empty.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|other|another {{tt|stop_token}} object to construct this {{tt|stop_token}} object with}}
{{par end}}

===Postconditions===
@1@ {{lc|stop_possible()}} and {{lc|stop_requested()}} are both {{c|false}}.
@2@ {{c|*this}} and {{c|other}} share the same associated stop-state and compare equal.
@3@ {{c|*this}} has {{c|other}}'s previously associated stop-state, and {{c|other.stop_possible()}} is {{c|false}}.
